title: You made it Happen!
text: Hi' this is gregory , i have been suffering from tuberclosis past  10 years  CrowdCharity has helped me in surviving this desease , each day i pray to god and thanks him for being able to live another day.

title: You are the reason Suraj gets to live his dream
text: Our son’s cancer had relapsed after 2.5 years of chemotherapy & we knew we couldn’t afford his life-saving treatment. But thanks to your donations & prayers, he underwent successful treatment & is recovering well. May God bless you all for saving his life!” -Mother

title: Your support gave my Brother a second chance at life
text: I express my heartfelt gratitude towards you all for saving my brother, Vedant's life! He was suffering from CLD Budd Chiari Syndrome, and a liver transplant was his only hope at survival, but we couldn't afford it. We would've lost him had it not been for your generosity and prayers. Thank you for lighting up our lives. He is doing better than ever post his liver transplant.
